data.name: Balance Breakers - A Battle Party Game
data.detailed_description:
Join Discord



About the Game

Be the Balance Breakers!

Pick your Breakers, fight against enemies and bosses, collect treasures to claim the victory.

2v2 - Team Battle

Team up as 2 to fight the opponent, raid treasures and throw orbs for the win.

Matches are held on maps with the boss, casting dangerous skills to knock everyone off!

Free for all - Rumble Arena

Battle royale is needed for the party! Just fight for yourself in the battleground!

Plan the strategy on maps with special mechanics, keep the most treasures until the end.

A party battle game for everyone

Breakers with special dash skill are easy to learn, choose your fighters based on play styles.

Wombo combo with other breakers to kick other opponents away from the victory.

Features:

  • Fancy graphics come with epic battles
  • Simple to control, easy to learn and fun to watch
  • Breakers casting special Dash Skills can be chosen each game
  • Grand Tournament: Race to 20 points to see who are the best player in the party
  • Grand Tournament includes classic Team Battle and Rumble Arena matches
  • Team Battle Mode: the classic 2v2 team fight
  • Team Battle maps include boss with unique skills and ultimate
  • Rumble Arena Mode: the free for all chaotic battle
  • Rumble Arena maps include different mechanics and special winning methods
  • Party Mode: Special gameplay mode to spice up the party
  • Party Mode includes “Fast Forward”, “One Punch”, “Treasure Room” and “Chess” modes
  • Extra Bonus in game: a 10 minutes intro animation!

data.short_description: Balance Breakers is a couch co-op battle party game for 1-4 players. Facing the attacks from opponents and bosses, players have to team up and fight for the most treasures to claim the victory.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.6.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
